segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar like he’s on a mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks so unstable, and he doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, waiting for him to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe they’re doing this while their mom is right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and I’m just waiting for it to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is getting closer to them, and the floor is so slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re going to regret this if they get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But they look so determined, like nothing else matters right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t fall and hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR
